name: Extraction Valley Devils' Curse
detailed_description:
Extraction Valley Devils' Curse™ is an indie first/third-person action shooter genre online multiplayer video game developed by RAM Studios, sponsored by CodeGen and powered by Unreal Engine 4.

Create two teams of 8v8 with your friends, defeat devils as well as your opponent team and enjoy the multiplayer shooter experience which offers both PvP and PvE mixed gameplay. Equip different guns and power-ups wisely to defeat the devil and loot the treasure to win a match.
about_the_game:
Extraction Valley Devils' Curse™ is an indie first/third-person action shooter genre online multiplayer video game developed by RAM Studios, sponsored by CodeGen and powered by Unreal Engine 4.

Create two teams of 8v8 with your friends, defeat devils as well as your opponent team and enjoy the multiplayer shooter experience which offers both PvP and PvE mixed gameplay. Equip different guns and power-ups wisely to defeat the devil and loot the treasure to win a match.
short_description: Create two teams of 8v8 with your friends and defeat devils as well as your friends in Extraction Valley Devils' Curse™ and enjoy the multiplayer shooter experience in different maps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 3Ghz / AMD FX-4300 3GHz 4-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT730 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: YES
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Gen or Higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX970 / AMD R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: YES
